alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Harrison and northwestern Jackson Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gulfport, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, St. Martin, D`iberville, Latimer and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 33 and 49. Interstate 110 in Mississippi near mile marker 1, and between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
